最最最最最喜欢的游戏！！！！一开始可能会觉得是个恐怖游戏，其实是个搞笑游戏，毕竟pretty good job so farrrrrr，因为这个游戏交了很多很有意思的朋友啊哈哈，和朋友一起玩超欢乐，经常玩着玩着眼泪就笑出来了，去外服玩的时候外服的各位也很可爱，就是有时候偶尔有些人1212嘲讽很烦，不过只要够厉害这些都不是问题啦，国服玩鬼排的比较慢，韩服玩鬼排的就很快，想玩鬼升段的朋友可以去韩服！！感谢这款游戏带给我的欢乐时光~~

Es un juego muy bien hecho, los asesinos dan miedo y aún más con la música súper escalofriante con la que cuenta, y cambia de acuerdo la situación, poniéndote cada vez más nervioso conforme avanza el juego.
Cabe resaltar que la comunidad es bastante tóxica, pero cuando encuentras a alguien buena persona, se disfruta mucho, lo mejor de este juego es jugar en equipo, el equipo aquí lo es todo, si un integrante se aleja o no ayuda, el.juego esta perdido, si te gusta jugar en equipo, este es tu juego
Fun as hell. Basically a horror version of tag. The horror is only for the beginning 10 hours tho. after that it is more of a comedy. Would recommend.
很好玩，如果多人玩就是很快乐的游戏，单人玩肾上腺素飙升，被鬼追，被鬼挂，溜鬼，简直不要太爽好玩归好玩，就是一个人玩久了还是想和朋友一起玩，快乐游戏才是最重要的嘛。
好玩极了，里面逃生者的移速是杀手的两倍，蹲着也比杀手走的快，上钩不加进度条，对杀手来说十分具有挑战性，

Muy buen juego

Over 1k hours. Boy, is this an achievement or a failure? 
I'll tell ya wHAt. I've had some of the best experiences gaming on DBD. Countless friends gained online, better IRL friends because we played the hell out of it together making memories, and so on. 
Dead By Daylight is an incredible time. There are really countless scenarios you will find yourself in. At even 1,000+ hours, nearly every game makes me laugh, get excited about a good loop or I learn something or want to adjust my playstyle for a bit to try new perks/strategies/map combos that I see. 
If you're someone that likes replay value and grinding out details of the games you enjoy, this is your game. This game actually rewards you for truly understanding and micromanaging mechanics/patch changes/base game knowledge. 

However. No other game (not even League of Legends) has triggered my temper. There are a lot of issues with this game and there ALWAYS will be. I think this game has gone beyond what the Devs could have ever imagined and to me, it shows in some choices they make or dont make depending on the communities voices. I am not discrediting them, I'd like to urge. There is nothing like this out there, and if it's similar, it's not even half as good as Dead By Daylight.

PS
-Nerf boon totems
-Buff killers in some way. Idk how, but as of 4-11-2022, survivors are running wild while killers are becoming disinterested in our game. 
-delete huntress if you cant figure out hitboxes
-let me pick challenges while im in Q for a match
-let me disable bloodweb audio. So when I spend 1 million points straight to make room for more victories, I dont have to hear the same sample 3billion times. Let me enjoy my youtube on the other monitor in peace. ----this is honestly my biggest request in dead by daylight. Give us more audio control. PLEASE! 

Yes. Buy this game. 
Just dont go down the rabbit hole of ranking if you're too competitive and have a temper.

Where to begin. Overall addictive game but buggy as fuck since launch and nothing has been done about it. First of all, the hitboxes don't even exist, For example I am 4 foot away from the killer, I use dead hard at the precise time and soon as I use it, Killer hits me from 8 feet. Even when I play as killer I am shocked on how bad the hitboxes are. Second Matchmaking is terrible, I have been in matches where there is a rank 4 or higher maybe even more and have to play with them, it is mindblowing on how this game portays matchmaking. I know that 75% of survivors are rank 15 or lower but at the same time, it's like "really?". Finally, the community. The community is toxic as fuck from players calling you garbage or trash, cause you miss-timed a pallet or cause there just useless overall, but tbh weren't we all like that, when the game realsed day one. I do and I don't recommend this game, mainly because the game needs alot of work but at the same time, I can't stop playing this game cause of the addiction to play it.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀[h1]Dead by Daylight is, at its core, a fantastic game.[/h1]
[b]Issues however, are rampant, both within the game itself, and with regards to Behaviour Interactive.[/b]

Dead by Daylight; plagued by horrific servers, net-code and hit-boxes. Utterly clueless developers; more concerned with the banning of players for a couple of offensive words, alongside cashing in on cosmetics. In conjunction with the production of both unbalanced, and uninspired DLC content. Than they are with the longevity and improvement of a game full of potential.

[b]Contrary to how the above may portray my viewpoint, I neither hate Dead by Daylight, nor BHVR. In fact, my actual playtime sits at 745 hours as of writing this review.[/b]
My review will be changed to positive once the following criteria are met: 
The dedicated servers are truly fixed, and brought to an acceptable standard for a game of this scale. And, BHVR no longer subscribe to an anti-free speech agenda, headed by radical SJWs. 
I truly believe neither of these will ever change, not without a complete revamp of both the product and its producers. Therefore, while I may enjoy this game. It will forever remain negatively scrutinised.

Tu cuando juegas una partida a un videojuego y pierdes y no te enfadas y piensas que es un juego eres una mierda, eso es lo que eres, siento decirtelo, eres una basura, no eres competitivo, no eres nadie, no vas a conseguir nada en la vida, eres un perdedor, siento mucho decirtelo es la realidad, esto no es un juego, nada es un juego. Esto que está detras de la camara no es un juego, como que un juego eres imbécil tu o que? Que te pasa, como que un juego. Yo cuando pierdo una arena me jode que flipas, caundo pierdo una rbg me jode que fplias porque no es un juego. Somos 10 personas contra 10 personas, que juego es este... Preguntale a Lebron James si es un juego, maldito ignorante de mierd. Preguntale a Lebron James que igual te pega un tortazo, pero como que un juego, un juego lo será para ti que eres un nomade de mierda que no ha conseguido nada en la vida, para mi no es un juego, no te equivoques eh
